name: Evan Ott's Webpage
body:
# Welcome
Welcome to my personal website. It's likely going to be under construction for a while.

# Projects
* MathematElection - using Facebook Likes to predict Election 2016 [mathematelection.blogspot.com](http://mathematelection.blogspot.com/)
* "Introduction to Data Analysis for Physics" - co-authored with Will Beason (@willbeason) using Brad Miller's (@bnmnetp) `runestone` system [see here](http://runestoneinteractive.org/), an online textbook bringing together the power of _Mathematica_, _LaTeX_, and statistics for physics applications [eaott.github.io/data-analysis](http://eaott.github.io/data-analysis/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
